about.title: About Us
about.description: Control Pass Kft. was founded in 2020 with the intention of providing high-quality and complex services for the construction, supervision, and operation of electrical, security, IT, and control systems for industrial facilities.
about.mission: Our determined goal is to develop a quality and secure service package for our clients in all aspects, from the design phase, through implementation and project management, to monitoring and operational solutions.
about.experience: We have serious experience in implementing industrial facilities utilizing renewable energies. Whether it's 50 kilowatts or several hundred megawatt power plants.
about.monitoring: Thanks to our self-developed monitoring and control technology solutions, we are able to monitor the built systems in real-time. And with our extensive network, we can intervene in a short time in case of a problem.
about.coverage: We currently implement nationwide coverage with 6 bases.
